DOC.brief_summary: This study draw proven intervention refine pilot test cue card drive computer-assisted intervention , along HIV/STI testing , tailor participant 's demographic characteristic , risk behavior , biological test result . The specific aim propose study : 1 . To refine cue card drive computer-assisted risk reduction intervention tailor participant 's demographic characteristic ( e.g. , gender , ethnicity ) , risk behavior , biological test result ( HIV , hepatitis B C , syphilis herpes ) . 2 . To pilot test tailor intervention 's effect sexual risk behavior ( e.g. , frequency unprotected sex , condom use ) , drug use sex injection risk behavior ( e.g. , direct syringe sharing , indirect sharing practice ) use two-group randomized design compare tailor intervention delay treatment control condition . 3 . To assess feasibility acceptability tailor intervention rural setting .
DOC.brief_title: Computer-Assisted Tailored Cue-card Health CATCH Study
DOC.criteria: The sample 120 drawn RaleighDurham , NC metro area follow target : 40 MSM ( least 12 African American , 12 nonHispanic white 12 Hispanic ) eligibility include unprotected sex another male past 30 day 40 sex worker ( least 6 male 6 female race/ethnicity ) eligibility include unprotected sex within last 30 day exchange sex money drug within past 30 day 40 drug user sex worker MSM ( least 2 male 2 female race/ethnicity ) eligibility include use methamphetamine , crack powder cocaine , heroin past 30 day unprotected intercourse and/or syringe share past 30 day . Additional eligibility criterion include follow : 18 year age old selfidentify male female selfidentify African American , nonHispanic white Hispanic currently seek substance use treatment speak understand write English proficiently resident Wake , Durham , Orange , Johnston Chatham county , plan move next 3 month
